data.prayer: Father, move the 43,234 believers in the state of Mayabeque to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mayabeque, Cuba
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 381,400 souls in Mayabeque and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Mayabeque, Cuba to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 43,234 believers in the state of Mayabeque the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of La Salud
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of La Salud, Mayabeque, Cuba.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Mayabeque, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Mayabeque to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 171,158 cultural Christians in the state of Mayabeque to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

location.name: Mayabeque
location.cities_list: Güines, San José de las Lajas, Madruga, La Salud, Jaruco
location.cities_list_w_pop: Güines (68,935), San José de las Lajas (54,847), Madruga (33,798), La Salud (28,796), Jaruco (20,207)
